name: typerloop
description: A tiny package for an animated text typing effect.  Zero external dependencies.

scripts.deploy:prerelease: npm version prerelease --preid=pre && git add . && git commit -m "publishing pre-release to npm" && git push && npm publish
scripts.deploy:patch: git push && git add . && git commit -m "publishing pre-release to npm" --allow-empty && npm version prerelease --preid=pre && git push && npm publish
scripts.deploy:minor: git push && git add . && git commit -m "publishing minor upgrade to npm" --allow-empty && npm version minor && git push && npm publish
scripts.deploy:major: git push && git add . && git commit -m "publishing major upgrade to npm" --allow-empty && npm version major && git push && npm publish

author: Jonathan Colby <hello@jonnycolby.com> (https://jonny.link/)
